item.title: $ whois hmussana
item.description: Hi! I am Hassan Mussana. A security guy with super-paranoid instincts; a software engineer, a DevSecOps advocate, a lover of turn-based & real-time strategy games, a grammar nazi, a chai lover, a cook, and a history buff. Can sniff sift through a lot of log types and find out where the mess up is. Also the guy who wouldn’t approve your PR if things are not aligned or not in alphabetical order or have extra spaces.

item.title: Coming soon!!
item.description: # /usr/bin/env python3 print(f"""Coming soon. Hold your horses!""") Output: Coming soon. Hold your horses!
